articles.author: Byram W. Bridle, Leonardo Susta, Samira Mubareka, Sarah Wootton, Shayan Sharif
articles.title: The mink link: How COVID-19 mutations in animals affect human health and vaccine effectiveness - The Conversation CA
articles.description: In the disturbing scenario of human-to-mink-to-human COVID-19 transmission, the virus may mutate in mink prior to re-infecting people. That possibility makes vaccine design even more crucial.
articles.content: The importance of commercially raised animals in the COVID-19 pandemic has received much attention in the past few weeks, when a new variant of SARS-CoV-2 was detected in farmed mink. Unfortunately, … [+8068 chars]
